member.name: SOFTDISTINFO
member.summary: Contains information about a software update.

member.name: SOFTDISTINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

summary.para: This parameter can take one of the following values.
The advertised state. It can take one of the following values.
"Update available" dialog box has not been presented to the user.
"Files downloaded" dialog box has not been presented to the user.
"Program installed" dialog box has not been presented to the user.
"Program installed" dialog box has been presented to the user.

member.name: SOFTDISTINFO.szTitle
member.summary: A string that contains the contents of the TITLE flag from the associated .cdf file.

member.name: SOFTDISTINFO.szAbstract
member.summary: A string that contains the contents of the ABSTRACT flag from the associated .cdf file.

member.name: SOFTDISTINFO.szHREF
member.summary: A string that contains the URL of the webpage to advertise or install the update.

member.name: SOFTDISTINFO.dwInstalledVersionMS
member.summary: The most-significant unsigned long integer value of the installed version number.

member.name: SOFTDISTINFO.dwInstalledVersionLS
member.summary: The least-significant unsigned long integer value of the installed version number.

member.name: SOFTDISTINFO.dwUpdateVersionMS
member.summary: The most-significant unsigned long integer value of the update version number.

member.name: SOFTDISTINFO.dwUpdateVersionLS
member.summary: The least-significant unsigned long integer value of the update version number.

member.name: SOFTDISTINFO.dwAdvertisedVersionMS
member.summary: The most-significant unsigned long integer value of the advertised version number.

member.name: SOFTDISTINFO.dwAdvertisedVersionLS
member.summary: The least-significant unsigned long integer value of the advertised version number.

member.name: SOFTDISTINFO.dwReserved
member.summary: Reserved. Must be set to zero.
